Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People have taken to social media to demand significant changes to be made in the upcoming Federal budget. Many call for an increase in job seeker strategies increased support for young individuals affordable health care and a pay rise for child care and aged care workers. Some people are calling for the abolishment of current government programs while others raise concerns about the spiralling cost of aged care services. With various reports and recommendations in play the pressure is on Treasurer Jim Chalmers to allocate extra funding and respond to a broad range of needs.
